sqls.sql: select * from AT_D_BS_SORTGRADE_LOG where 1=1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if entbarcode_s??> and ENTBARCODE_S=:entbarcode_s </#if> <#if gradecd_i??> and GRADECD_I=:gradecd_i </#if> <#if gradedesc_s??> and GRADEDESC_S=:gradedesc_s </#if> <#if id_s??> and ID_S=:id_s </#if> <#if ischeck_i??> and ISCHECK_I=:ischeck_i </#if> <#if proessdesc_s??> and PROESSDESC_S=:proessdesc_s </#if> <#if proess_i??> and PROESS_I=:proess_i </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if stationdesc_s??> and STATIONDESC_S=:stationdesc_s </#if> <#if station_i??> and STATION_I=:station_i </#if> <#if begin_created_time??> and to_char(SYNC_CREATE_TIME_T,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss')> :begin_created_time </#if> <#if end_created_time??> and to_char(SYNC_CREATE_TIME_T,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss')< :end_created_time </#if> <#if sync_flag_s??> and SYNC_FLAG_S=:sync_flag_s </#if> <#if sync_hand_flag_s?? > <#if sync_hand_flag_s=='2'> and SYNC_HAND_FLAG_S=(:sync_hand_flag_s-2) </#if> <#if sync_hand_flag_s=='1'> and SYNC_HAND_FLAG_S=:sync_hand_flag_s </#if> </#if> <#if sync_hand_msg_s??> and SYNC_HAND_MSG_S=:sync_hand_msg_s </#if> <#if sync_hand_time_t??> and SYNC_HAND_TIME_T=:sync_hand_time_t </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>

select count(1) from AT_D_BS_SORTGRADE_LOG where 1=1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if entbarcode_s??> and ENTBARCODE_S=:entbarcode_s </#if> <#if gradecd_i??> and GRADECD_I=:gradecd_i </#if> <#if gradedesc_s??> and GRADEDESC_S=:gradedesc_s </#if> <#if id_s??> and ID_S=:id_s </#if> <#if ischeck_i??> and ISCHECK_I=:ischeck_i </#if> <#if proessdesc_s??> and PROESSDESC_S=:proessdesc_s </#if> <#if proess_i??> and PROESS_I=:proess_i </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if stationdesc_s??> and STATIONDESC_S=:stationdesc_s </#if> <#if station_i??> and STATION_I=:station_i </#if> <#if begin_created_time??> and to_char(SYNC_CREATE_TIME_T,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss')> :begin_created_time </#if> <#if end_created_time??> and to_char(SYNC_CREATE_TIME_T,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss')< :end_created_time </#if> <#if sync_flag_s??> and SYNC_FLAG_S=:sync_flag_s </#if> <#if sync_hand_flag_s?? > <#if sync_hand_flag_s=='2'> and SYNC_HAND_FLAG_S=(:sync_hand_flag_s-2) </#if> <#if sync_hand_flag_s=='1'> and SYNC_HAND_FLAG_S=:sync_hand_flag_s </#if> </#if> <#if sync_hand_msg_s??> and SYNC_HAND_MSG_S=:sync_hand_msg_s </#if> <#if sync_hand_time_t??> and SYNC_HAND_TIME_T=:sync_hand_time_t </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if>
